questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with the image placed below.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment and accessories.
prepare a Damage and Missing Report or Incident report.
Switch on the Equipment and confirm the Equipment is getting ON.
heck the power cable and confirm power plug integrity and loose connection are present.
connect the power cable properly
open the equipment as shown in below video and check the internal fuse.
Confirm whether the fuse is burnt.
replace the Fuse with a new one
confirm whether sufficient amount of vapour / Nebulization is provided by the equipment.
Check the tube connection and confirm for any loose connection.
Advice the user to get a new tubing set
Check the Inlet filter and confirm whether it is occupied by dust.
Clean the inlet filter accordingly
Check the internal tubing connections for any physical damage (Cracks / Breaks)
kindly replace the tubing set with a new one
check and confirm whether the suction Motor is running.
observe whether the motor winding is getting heated too much and can sense burnt smell.
Replace the Motor Assembly and close the Equipment properly and carefully.
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
